data.name: Alderamin on the Sky: A Stormy Encounter
data.short_description: Ikta is a brilliant, but lazy and unmotivated boy.  His childhood friend, a high-ranking daughter of a noble, offers him an easy position at a library if he can help he get the top score on a military exam.  But their lives take a sudden turn when the boat carrying them to the exam runs aground...

English*, Japanese
